About.title: About
About.AboutText: Since I was younger, I've looked for a job different of people arround me, and when I start to learn code I identified myself with IT area, and I kept developing new skills, meeting new people and taking advantage of new opportunities. Now, I always work with a smile on my face and love in the eyes. To learn more about me, keep exploring my site or reach out directly.

Address.title: Address
Address.value: Av. Ilda Rosa da Cunha, 497, casa 2, Ribeirópolis - Praia grande
